author: quintonm
msg: Exceptions thrown while executing the "getter" method of
a mapped object were incorrectly reporting that the
problem occured while executing the "setter" method.

author: quintonm
msg: setDafultValue() is now public.  This will allow
the value of the field to be set with a value that
does nto come from a mapped object.
